product_name: La Roche-PosayAnthelios Mineral Tinted Fluid Face Sunscreen SPF 40
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganHSA/FSA eligibleLa Roche Posay Anthelios Tinted Mineral Fluid Sunscreen SPF 40 is a lightweight, non-greasy, face sunscreen, offering broad spectrum UVA/UVB protection with iron oxides to minimize white cast.
details: DetailsBenefitsAnthelios Tinted Mineral Sunscreen is now available in four flexible shades, ideal for a broad range of skin tonesFormulated with Cell-Ox Shield Technology® for broad spectrum UVA/UVB protection and a powerful antioxidant sun protectionTinted mineral sunscreen formula with iron oxides features a light tintLightweight, non-greasy matte sunscreen leaves skin hydrated with a radiant, natural finishIdeal for all skin types, including Sensitive SkinWater resistant up to 40 minutesNon-comedogenicRecommended by the Skin Cancer FoundationDermatologist Tested, Sensitive Skin Tested, Allergy TestedKey IngredientsCell-Ox Shield technology features titanium dioxide for broad-spectrum mineral sunscreen protection plus powerful antioxidant protection to help defend skin cells against damaging free radicals caused by UV rays.Formulated WithoutFragranceParabensOxybenzoneOctinoxateAvobensoneOilItem 2625717How To UseShake well before use. Apply generous amount 15 minutes before sun exposure. Massage into skin until fully absorbed. Reapply at least every 2 hours. Reapply immediately after towel drying.IngredientsIsohexadecane, Water, Dimethicone, Triethylhexanoin, C15-19 Alkane, Silica, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Caprylyl Methicone, Butyloctyl Salicylate, Iron Oxides, Aluminum Stearate, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Dicaprylyl Ether, Talc, Dimethicone/Peg-10/15 Crosspolymer, Alumina, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Peg-9 Polydimethylsiloxyethyl Dimethicone, Pentylene Glycol, Acrylates/Dimethicone Copolymer, Aluminum Hydroxide, Stearic Acid, Niacinamide, Phenoxyethanol, Magnesium Sulfate, Caprylyl Glycol, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Diethylhexyl Syringylidenemalonate, Tocopherol, Disodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Propylene Carbonate, Cassia Alata Leaf Extract, Maltodextrin, Dipropylene Glycol, Sodium Citrate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride.
how_to_use: Shake well before use. Apply generous amount 15 minutes before sun exposure. Massage into skin until fully absorbed. Reapply at least every 2 hours. Reapply immediately after towel drying.

reviews.headline: orange goop
reviews.comments: this type of tinted sunscreen they make is nit great, color was VERY orange and didnt blend well at all. I did shake it and was goopy ans sticky

reviews.headline: Really wanted to like this…
reviews.comments: The texture of the sunscreen was fine, it was the color that wasn't at all right…very orange. Disappointed because I've been looking for a tinted sunscreen to match.

reviews.headline: Skin of color rejoice!
reviews.comments: If you're darker skinned/POC, you will rejoice at the sight of this product. A mineral sunscreen that leaves NO ashy gray cast. This sunscreen is so pigmented I often use as my face makeup and set lightly. For warm, yellow undertones. Virtually looks like skin on my milk chocolate skin. I use color deep, I use hands and brush to apply. Excess on hands goes on neck and body. Only con: I've noticed more oil in t zones by mid day.

reviews.headline: I love the sunblock aspect of this product but...
reviews.comments: The tint is dark! It leaves your hands pretty streaked, so it is not a sunblock you can put on and go.

reviews.headline: Great formula, wish there were more tones
reviews.comments:
Love LRP! Their sunscreens are great and my favorite on the market. 

I ordered the medium tone and it does have an olive undertone. I do not have an olive undertone so J thought it made me look gray but once I blended it out it was OK with my other products and I actually love how my skin looks 8 hours later.

reviews.headline: It's complicated
reviews.comments: This is a great tinted SPF that for me works as a (very good) foundation, however if I'm putting it on in the car or on the go I need a wet wipe for my hands. If I put it on like makeup it would be much better. Mind the application, can be messy.

reviews.headline: SO ORANGE
reviews.comments: The original tinted sunscreen is my holy grail, and i wanted to try this to get a slightly deeper shade to match when I self tan. What the heck. Its so orange? I looked like an oompa loompa and my husband got embarassed to go out with me. I had to return it and usually I'm not one to return because i hate wasting products. very disappointed in this, especially since i like their original one so much

reviews.headline: too orange!
reviews.comments: it kind of looks good on my skin and blends well. My skin is between light to medium.I feel a bit disappointed that it's too orange and makes my face look too tan.

reviews.headline: Great coverage
reviews.comments: Beautiful sunscreen. It has a great coverage and also when it sits, leaves yoir skin with a beautiful radiant look.  Just be carefull with your clothes because it isn't transfer proof.

reviews.headline: disappointed
reviews.comments: i use a lot of the la roche posay products in my routine so i am confused as to how it pills on top of my double repair moisturizer.

reviews.headline: Loved it
reviews.comments: I just got it and already been using ot for 1 week and must say that i will definitely repurchase this product. I got it because i am going to the beach and wanted something convenient to take with me so i dont hace to carry foundation everywhere, i would say it is not my perfect shade its a little bit darker but after a lot pf sun this will be perfect. I love the consistency and how it feels in my skin its now dewy it feels good for a humid enviroment if you have dry skin maybe not so good but if you are normal or oily this is a good option.

reviews.headline: Everywhere. hot mess. literally
reviews.comments: The medium shade is nice for my skin tone but then i realized i touch my face too often because there was brown orange eveywhere. hot mess. i didnt wear make up so maybe better luck with a setting powder on top?

reviews.headline: Horrible!
reviews.comments: This sunscreen felt greasy, sticky, and flaky. Also left my face orange! Do not recommend.

reviews.headline: Horrible!
reviews.comments: This sunscreen felt greasy, sticky, and flaky. Also left my face orange! Do not recommend.

reviews.headline: Light weight, decent coverage
reviews.comments: This tinted sunscreen is a gem!! For days I don't want to wear makeup I use this product to give me light coverage. I wear sunscreen daily whether I wear makeup or not and this product is great for daily wear. It does have a light scent but not too bad. Super lightweight too.

reviews.headline: Great as a foundation not sure as a sunscreen!
reviews.comments: This product receive 5 stars for coverage, I never seen any foundation like this. So anyone wants best coverage with SPF this is good for them. The part I hate is it stain very badly eveywhere, does not blend into my skin. Its like I'm covered with the mud and it can stain on literally everything until I wash off. I usually apply 2 finger full length of sunscreen but I can't do it with this because I will end up like cakey and stain everywhere a lot. I'm not sure if I need this much coverage on my sunscreen all I need is to melt in my skin and protection. The color is okay. My skin is somewhere inbetween medium and medium tan. Medium tan is little ashy on my skin but still it gives great coverage. I love la roche-posay products so it's definitely not a failure.

reviews.headline: Girl get this
reviews.comments: I actually love the sunscreen. The fact that it matches my skin complexion is a bonus, and it's so lightweight. That's scent is nothing. The coverage is great. It's very light, the texture knows that you have to reply every 2 hours. That's the downfall, but I like that.  It's the same skin complexion as mine, like I said

reviews.headline: Coverage!!!
reviews.comments: Was really surprised by the coverage! Really pretty shade and matched pretty well with my skin tone. The only drawback is the white cast. Neutral scent and really nice packaging as well

reviews.headline: Good, but not great
reviews.comments:
I can only use this for sheer overage,  any attempt to build up any coverage resulted in piling, so I'm not sure how i could reapply every two hours. 

This works for quick outings on my skin type. But that's all

reviews.headline: Good to use under makeup
reviews.comments: The shade I received was too light for my skin even though I got the deep color so that was surprising. But the product goes on very smooth and looks great I know I would love it if it had the right shade. The scent is fine and I like the light coverage. This is good to use under my foundation but I wouldn't use it on its own it looks ashy.

faceoff_positive.comments:
La Roche-Posay Anthelios Tinted Sunscreen for Deep Skin Tones is a mineral sunscreen designed to provide sun protection while offering a natural tint for deeper skin tones. Here's a detailed review of the product:

SPF and Protection

This sunscreen offers SPF 50 broad-spectrum protection, shielding the skin from both UVA and UVB rays. It uses 100% mineral filters (zinc oxide and titanium dioxide), which are ideal for sensitive skin and provide a physical barrier against the sun without being absorbed into the skin.

Tint and Finish

The standout feature of this product is the tint that caters to deeper skin tones. Unlike many mineral sunscreens that leave a white cast, this formula is tinted to blend seamlessly with dark skin tones. The tint offers light coverage, evening out the complexion without feeling heavy or cakey. It leaves a natural, satin-matte finish that's neither too shiny nor too drying, making it suitable for everyday wear, even under makeup.

Texture and Feel

The sunscreen has a lightweight, fluid texture that spreads easily across the skin. It absorbs quickly and doesn't feel greasy or thick, which is often a concern with mineral sunscreens. Users with oily skin will appreciate the non-comedogenic formula that doesn't clog pores or contribute to breakouts.

Skin Benefits

In addition to sun protection, this product is enriched with antioxidants, particularly La Roche-Posay's signature thermal spring water, which helps soothe and calm the skin. The antioxidant-rich formula helps protect against free radical damage, further safeguarding the skin from environmental stressors.

Who It's For

This sunscreen is ideal for individuals with deeper skin tones who struggle to find mineral sunscreens that don't leave a white cast. It's also great for those with sensitive, oily, or acne-prone skin, as it is free from harsh chemicals and offers gentle, yet effective sun protection.

Pros

1. No White Cast: The tinted formula blends beautifully into deeper skin tones without leaving a chalky residue.

2. SPF 50 Protection: Provides high broad-spectrum protection against UVA/UVB rays.

3. Lightweight Formula: The fluid texture absorbs easily and feels comfortable on the skin.

4. Matte Finish: Great for those with oily skin or who prefer a matte look.

5. Antioxidant-Rich: Offers additional skin benefits through antioxidants and soothing ingredients.

6. Non-Comedogenic: Doesn't clog pores, making it suitable for acne-prone skin.

Cons

1. Light Coverage: The tint provides very light coverage, so it may not replace foundation or heavier coverage products for those looking to conceal more.

2. Limited Shade Range: While the tint works well for deeper skin tones, the range may not suit all shades perfectly.

3. Price: It is slightly more expensive compared to drugstore sunscreens, but the quality justifies the price for many users.

Final Thoughts

La Roche-Posay Anthelios Tinted Sunscreen for Deep Skin Tones is a great option for those seeking sun protection without the typical white cast that comes with mineral sunscreens. Its lightweight feel, matte finish, and high SPF protection make it an ideal everyday sunscreen, especially for those with deeper skin tones. While the tint provides only light coverage, it offers a more even complexion and natural look, making it perfect for minimal makeup days.
faceoff_positive.headline: La Roche posay

faceoff_negative.comments: The bottles are small, and the instructions say to apply every 2 hours. Not sure how this would work because it's a Tinted sunscreen. the product itself doesn't apply matte so you would have to not set your face with powder to be able to reapply. The product itself does not wash off with water, but a regular facewash, balm or cleansing oil works well. The tones were very yellow with both deep and medium deep, but when combined I found that the shade worked the best for me, because neither of them worked well on their own. I would say that I have a light tan, caramel skintone. The product itself didn't apply well with my hands, but applied much better with a damp beauty sponge. the dry sponge didn't seem to work well either. It's not something I would buy for everyday use but it worked as advertised. I received this product for free for my unbiased review.
faceoff_negative.headline: Good

rollup.name: Anthelios Mineral Tinted Fluid Face Sunscreen SPF 40
